name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern SD40-2 High Nose Long Hood Forward Loco
summary: General Motors' bestselling SD40-2 diesel locomotive comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Norfolk Southern black livery in its popular high nose, long hood variant. Around 4,000 models of the Dash 2 series locomotive were built between 1972 until 1989 as an upgrade to the SD40.
